titles.title: To require preference to be given to applicants for health profession opportunity grants under section 2008 of the Social Security Act who have certain kinds of business and community partners.
MORE Act
Making Opportunities Reachable for Everyone Act
MORE Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Worker and Family Support.

bill.summary:
Making Opportunities Reachable for Everyone Act or the MORE Act
This bill requires the Department of Health and Human Services to give preference to grantees with specified partners, such as state and local government agencies and health care employers, when awarding certain grants for providing low-income individuals with education and training for health care occupations.
